label: 綸旨
対訳語: Edict of a reigning emperor, with the force of law.
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Edict of a reigning emperor, with the force of law. Favorite of Go-Daigo and his heirs. Whether this document had precedence over a retired emperor's inzen remained disputed during the fourteenth century. [後醍醐、院宣]
